testcase.name: authenticated-request

failure.message: Request failed: An invalid request URI was provided. Either the request URI must be an absolute URI or BaseAddress must be set.

testcase.failure: HTTP GET $base_url/protected Error: Request failed: An invalid request URI was provided. Either the request URI must be an absolute URI or BaseAddress must be set.
